page.title: 04OCCUPATIONS
page.content:
IN WHITTONSTALL THERE ARE 11 FARMERS/FARMWORKERS, 1 BUILDER, 1 ENGINEER, 9 HOUSEWIVES, 1 DINNER LADY, 1 CARETAKER, 1 TYNE PILOT, 1 POLICEMAN,4 EXECUTIVES, 3 OFFICE WORKERS, 1 LECTURER, 2 PUBLICANS/CATERERS, 4 RETIRED PEOPLE/OAP'S, 1 CHIROPODIST, 3 DRIVERS, 2 GARAGE WORKERS/PETROL PUMP ATTENDANTS, 1 STUDENT AND 1 PHOTOGRPAHER.
DURING TERM-TIME 3 TEACHERS TRAVEL TO THE SCHOOL FROM OTHER AREAS. RESIDENTS USE CARS TO TRAVEL UP TO 30 MILES TO WORK.VERY FEW PEOPLE USE PUBLIC TRANSPORT AS THE SERVICE IS TOO INFREQUENT. NO-ONE IN WHITTONSTALL IS UNEMPLOYED BUT MANY PEOPLE ARE IN POORLY PAID OCCUPATIONS.
